resources.string: This is the lite version of the full application. The full application offers many more workouts and features. Please purchase the full version from the Android Market.

The HIIT Treadmill Assistant Lite has predefined HIIT treadmill workouts. Just select your sprint speed, your interval time and the intensity of your workout. The software will tell you what to do. You can even play your favorite music as you workout!

When you use the HIIT Treadmill Assistant Lite software, you agree to indemnify and hold harmless Audible Android Products for any loss, liability, claim, damage, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys\' fees) arising from or in connection with your use of the HIIT Treadmill Assitant fitness software application.\nDo you Agree to these terms?
You must accept the disclaimer agreement before using HIIT Treadmill Assistant Lite
The HIIT Assistant Lite will setup a treadmill work out for you using the sprint speed you select and the intesity (number of intervals and rest length) you choose.
